title: Small Shell - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   School Life   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Cold Love Interests   Cute Story   Female Protagonist   Shy Characters
author: HuaiSu   怀愫
description:
Shang Beibei didn’t intend to date Xiao Yang.

She only wanted to secretly take a peek and add some excitement to her dry and dull high school life.

Unexpectedly, Xiao Yang, upon seeing this, became angry.

“So my love rival is the gaokao!”

*gaokao: National College Entrance Examination>
